==============

Attributes

   lettings.views.logger


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: logger

.. py:function:: index(request)

   View function for displaying the list of all lettings.


.. py:function:: letting(request, letting_id)

   View function for displaying the details of a specific letting.
